Health Execllence

Management

Our vision in Med-In specialist Hospital is to be a one-stop hospital that provides fully integrated Medicare solutions and health-related services to Nigeria populace and beyond. And our core values are: Empathy, Professionalism, Innovation, Patient Satisfaction and Integrity.

Dr Awosika is a seasoned and vastly experienced Medical practitioner, with well over four decades of active medical and professional experience. He graduated from the prestigious University of Benin with MBBS Deree in 1977, and did his housemanship at the Military Hospital, Yaba between 1977-1978. He proceeded to the United Kingdom for his postgraduate Training where he bagged a Diploma in Tropical Medicine and Health from the University of Liverpool, and Master of Surgery from National University of Ireland, Gallway. His work experience started in the Nigerian Army as a Medical Corps at the Military Hospital, Yaba and was later transferred to Enugu as a commanding Officer, GDMO Military Hospital, Enugu between 1978-1979, after which he resigned from the Nigerian Army in 1981 as a substantive Captain. He then proceeded to the United Kingdom and worked in various Hospitals including Bradford Royal Infirmary, Kings College Hospital, London, St. Vincent Hospital, Dublin and University College Hospital, Gallway, Ireland. And on his return to Nigeria in 1986, He established Med-In Specialist Hospital.

Dr. Olubayode Olugbenga Awosika

MBBS, MSS, Dsc, DTM&H, FAMS,FOSHA. Chief Medical Director

Mr. Adebekun is a well experienced & goal-driven administrator & a strategic business executive, with over 22years of comprehensive business management experience. He is exceptionally endowed in various business management skills such as human capital development, customer experience management, integrity leadership, cost-effective and seamless office administration, manpower training & development, logistics & operations management, public relations, just to mention a few. had his first degree in Business Administration from the University of first choice, University of Lagos, Akoka and his Master of Science in Management also from University of Lagos, Akoka, with his PhD in Management in view. He is also an active member of the following professional associations: Associate Member - Chartered Institute of Personnel Management (ACIPM). Full Member - Chartered Institute of Public Diplomacy & Management (MCIPD). Associate Member - Chartered Institute of Management Consultants, USA Associate Member – Advertising Practitioner Council of Nigeria.

Mr Adebekun Olatunde Olusola

B.Sc, M.Sc, ACIPM, MCIPD, MCIMC,
Arpa Head, Directorate Of Admin & Human Resources

Dr. Imma .O. Anabi is a general medical practitioner with over a decade of clinical administration experience. She obatained her `O` level West African School Certificate and ‘A’ level Certificate from Marywood Grammar School Ebute-Metta and Methodist Girls High School, Yaba respectively. She proceeded to the University of Lagos, Akoka where she bagged her Bachelor of Science Degree in Biochemistry in 1994, had her NYSC at Igbinedion Hospital Medical Research Centre now Igbinedion University between 1994-1995. She then proceeded to Olabisi Onabanjo University where she obtained her MBCh.B degree in 2005. While in Medical School, She had an M.Sc in Psychology(Clinical) from University of Lagos in 2004. She did her Medical Internship training at Federal Medical Centre, Abeokuta. While in practice, she obtained an MPA in Public Policy from the University of Lagos, and a Post Graduate Certificate in Peadiatric Nutrition from Boston University College of Medicine. She has worked in different private hospitals in Lagos as a Medical Officer in varying care. She is also BLS & ACLS certified and have made her works in the various hospitals she has worked.

Dr. Immaculata Obiageri Anabi

B.Sc, MBch.B, M.Sc, MPA, BLS, ACLS. Director of Clinical Services

Mrs Adeoso is a qualified financial accounting professional with well over 6 years of professional experience. She bagged her Bachelor of Technology degree in Management and Accounting from a reputable tertiary institution, Ladoke Akintola University of Technology, and also obtained her Master of Business Administration(MBA) from Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife. She is currently undergoing her professional training & certification at the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria(ICAN). Her work experience started as an intern at the Guardian Newspapers, Oshodi, and observed her National Youth Service Corp program at Oshogbo Grammar School, Oshogbo. We also worked at Reddington Hospital, Ikeja as the Account Executive for about Six(6) years, and later joined Med-In Specialist Hospital on 28th of October, 2019 as the substantive accountant. She is happily married to her Prince Charming, Mr Adebowale Adeoso and their union is blessed with two boys.

Mrs Adeoso Oyelayo Ibidunni

B. Tech, MBA Head Of Accounts
